message: So far the biggest help I've had is Stephen Kochan's 'Programming in Objective-C 2.0 & the Apress book 'Beginning iPhone Development'. I'm new to programming and Kochan's books was great at teaching Obj-C without prior knowledge of C, which was a problem for me with a few books. I read the apple docs on Object Oriented Programming with Obj-C prior to these, and the basic understanding I had of Actionscript helped me with the concepts a bunch. What books/resources have you used?
The Apress books are good. I also found "Programming iOS 4" to be very well-written: http://oreilly.com/catalog/0636920010258
@bgreenlee I've heard some good things about that, I'm gonna check it out thanks
